description: Allergen Information: Free of Dairy, egg, corn, soy, gluten, yeast. Serves 2. Oil-free Lentil soup. Spicy garlic Dal. Simple soup with tempering of blended up onion, tomato and spices directly added to the lentils to add flavor. Vegan Glutenfree Recipe
name: Oil free Lentil Soup. Spicy Garlic Dal
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup lentils (Indian or Spanish brown lentils, washed and soaked for 5 minutes)

recipeInstructions.text: Blend the onion, tomato and all the ingredients for the sauce until smooth. Add to a saucepan over medium heat. Cook for 10 to 12 minutes or until it thickens a bit. Stir occasionally.

Wash the lentils, drain and add to the sauce with water, salt, turmeric, paprika and cayenne. Partially cover and cook for 25 to 30 minutes or until lentils are tender to preference. Cook longer for mushier lentils.
Garnish with cilantro and lemon juice and serve with rice, flatbread, pita bread, crackers etc.
